column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////We went on a weekend so there were some extra selections in their bakery
column2: but it was also very packed and there was a line out the door
column3: so if you want to go for brunch
column4: I would suggest going a little early or just go on a week day. Since it was crowded there wasn't much parking either
column5: so bring your walking shoes because you might have to walk a bit.
